content: Do you want to add this certificate to certificate store and continue with user import?

comment.text: This translation key is used to confirm whether a user wants to add a certificate to the certificate store and continue with the import process. It appears as the title of a modal dialog in the LDAP settings category.

usage.context:
{t("LdapCertificateConfirm")}
{t("LdapAddCertificateToStoreConfirmation")}
{t("LdapSettingsSerialNumber")}: {cerficateIssue.serialNumber}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'liste des certificats' which is a bit verbose. A more natural phrasing would be 'magasin de certificats'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Souhaitez-vous ajouter ce certificat au magasin de certificats et poursuivre l'importation des utilisateurs ?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation uses a question mark at the end. While grammatically correct, the English version does not. It's best to maintain consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the question mark from the end: 'Wilt u dit certificaat toevoegen aan de certificatenwinkel en doorgaan met het importeren van gebruikers'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙම සහතිකයේ ගබඩා කිරීමට සහ පරිශීලකයා ආනයනය කිරීම සමඟ ඉදිරියට යාමට ඔබට අවශ්‍යද?' is not a natural or accurate translation of "Do you want to add this certificate to certificate store and continue with user import?". The phrasing is awkward. 'පරිශීලකයා ආනයනය කිරීම සමඟ' is a literal and less common way of saying 'user import'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: හැටිපත ඇතුළත් කිරීම හා පරිශීලකයා ආනයනය කිරීම కొనసాగಿಸಲು ඔබට අවශ්‍යද? (Hati pata athulatha kirimu ha pariseelakaya aanayanya kirimunu saksaagarala aanuva de)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'හා' (and) feels slightly clunky. It could be rephrased for a more fluid sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: හැටිපත ඇතුළත් කිරීම හා පරිශීලකයා ආනයනය කිරීම కొనసాగಿಸಲು ඔබට අවශ්‍යද? (Hati pata athulatha kirimu ha pariseelakaya aanayanya kirimunu saksaagarala aanuva de)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'potrdilo' is correctly spelled, but contextually it might be slightly formal. While not strictly incorrect, a more conversational alternative might improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'certifikat' as a potentially more accessible alternative, although 'potrdilo' is technically correct.
